name: shyhurricane
description: Chrome extension that forwards HTTP traffic to the ShyHurricane MCP server.
author: Patrick Double

scripts.copy: mkdirp dist && shx cp manifest.json background.js options.js options.html dist/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && cd dist && zip -r ../shyhurricane-chrome-$npm_package_version.zip .
